item.description:
Dear Integral Friends,

We are thrilled to announce that Integral Institute's CEO, Robb Smith will be joining us for a Q&A "coffee" session on Saturday, October 18th from 11:45 am - 1:00 pm. This is an amazing opportunity to both learn from Robb and share with him the great spirit of our group. I hope you will all attend!

Please also note that it is Samadhi's 3rd year Anniversary, and we are offering many cool events that weekend - including talks/demos on Ayurvedic bodywork, Svaroopa Yoga, and the 5,000 year old tradition of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Acupuncture.

We hope to see ya'll there!

Samadhi
796 Beacon Street
Newton Centre, MA 02459
617-243-0034
www.samadhiyogatribe.com
item.name: Boston Integral Commons (Ken Wilber group) October Meetup
